bio: Hridayesh Sharma is a Software Engineer who is interested in how the web works and developer tools that make working with the web easier.

Hitesh deeply cares about creating world-class, functional, and beautiful products and web that help people make a difference. He can be as involved in a project as needed â€” from the seed of the idea to design, creative direction, system design, and even the front-end and WordPress build.
He is a curious developer who likes to think deeply about the world around him. He loves to blog about things he is learning and explores new technologies from time to time.
Mayank is a Software developer at LoginRadius. He graduated with a Bachelor of Technology degree in Computer Science. He loves playing cricket, watching TV series, and listening to music.
Raghunath is a technical content writer with a graduate degree in computer science. He is also a Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) enthusiast and enjoys studying the English language.

Gaurav Bewal is an Automation Engineer always ready to grab the opportunity to learn new things. He has working knowledge in Selenium-Java, Cucumber-Java, Nodejs-Nightwatch, Mocha-Chai, Appium, and many more. Apart from this, he loves music and playing all type of sports.
He is the Lead Product Architect @LoginRadius. He loves working with technology and building something new. He is also a breakthrough thinker, DevOps guy, and cybersecurity enthusiast.

He is a full-stack web application developer, software engineer, and technical writer, currently living in Nigeria, Portharcourt. He has an HND in Computer Science from Federal Polytechnic Nekede. His primary focus and inspiration for his studies is web development. In his free time, he studies human psychology and writes technical tutorials.

Deepak is the CTO and co-founder of LoginRadius, a rapidly-expanding Customer Identity Management provider. He's dedicated to innovating the LoginRadius platform. He loves foosball and winning poker games!
Working in LoginRadius as a Developer Advocate, Passionate about coding. I grab every chance I get to travel, learn and create.
Researcher, analyst and technical writer with a zeal to learn everyday. Empathic, enjoys mad dances and used to be a poet.
She is a software enthusiast, avid contributor, and regular blog writer. She loves to cook, savours street food, and enjoys music.

Technical/Logical person who believe in god not in religions, live in materialistic world but believe in minimilism, Love to cook but not to waste, want to sit alone but need everyone around, he is right but wrong too.
He is a Associate Software Engineer at LoginRadius.He loves playing cricket and enjoys music
